Date: Mon, 26 Jun 2000 19:20:54 EDT
Subject: The Neo Beast Wars RPG
To: nbwrpg@egroups.com
MIME-Version: 1.0
Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit
X-Mailer: CompuServe 2000 32-bit sub 103
From: KSLawdogg@...

Koga 
Shuko/Serpentor/Anubis/Hades/Unitron/Sixshot/Smokescreen/Bumblebee/Beachcomber
/Ramhorn/Manterror/Injector:




Koga Shuko raised his laser rifle, yelling "Charge!" to his forces, firing 
three laser blasts off at the Ark.

---

Serpentor raised his launcher, firing a plasma blast off at the Ark.

---

Anubis and Hades each raised their rifles, firing a total of 3 laser bolts 
and 3 plasma bolts off at the Ark.

---

Sixshot transformed into his ramming tank mode, swerving his dual-cannon, 
firing a single blast from the doublecannon off at the Ark.

---

Unitron aised both his rifles, firing three laser bolts off from each, all at 
the Ark.


---

Ramhorn ran into the Ark.  Activating his com, he spoke quickly after 
studying a monitor.  <Iron Raptor, we have Hell Beast and the Newcomers down 
our throats!> he yelled, activating shields, catching the last half of the 
blasts, activating the few autoguns remaining, heading for the outside, 
sub-machine gun raised.

---

Smokescreen took out his electro-distruptor rifle, Beachcomber taking out 
both of his laser pistols, the two of them heading to defend their base.

---

Manterror slammed into a tree from autogun fire.

---

Injector fired three stinger missiles at an autogun.

---

Double Punch cloaked, firing a missile off at the Ark.
